reza_ardeshir_rokni.name: Reza Ardeshir Rokni
reza_ardeshir_rokni.bio: In his 6 years @Google, Reza has been lucky enough to work across many industries from gaming to banking, applying Google's Data Analytics technologies to new domains. Currently as developer advocate for Google Cloud Dataflow, he gets to have fun talking about stream processing all day long..
reza_ardeshir_rokni.title: Google , Dataflow Developer Advocate

robert_burke.name: Robert Burke
robert_burke.bio: Robert is constantly working on managing his time, but really just wishes he could be multiple places at once, since that would be simpler all around. When he's not programming in Go, lately, he's probably not programming at all.
robert_burke.title: Senior Software Engineer

andrew_pilloud.title: Apache Beam Committer, Software Engineer at Google
andrew_pilloud.company: Apache Beam Committer, Software Engineer at Google
andrew_pilloud.name: Andrew Pilloud
andrew_pilloud.bio: Andrew Pilloud is a software engineer at Google and Apache Beam committer working primarily on SQL. He has previously presented at the first ever San Francisco Beam Meetup in 2018.

ismal_meja.name: Ismaël Mejía
ismal_meja.bio: Software Engineer with more than ten years of experience designing and developing information systems for financial groups, telecom companies and startups. Focused on Big Data and Cloud architectures (aka Distributed Systems). He works at Talend France as an Open Source Software Engineer. He is an Apache Beam committer and PMC member andan enthusiastic contributor to multiple open source projects.
ismal_meja.title: Software Engineer

alex_van_boxel.name: Alex Van Boxel
alex_van_boxel.bio:
Alex Van Boxel is a Big Data and Cloud Architect and Veepee.com. He loves working on operational requirement and kicking new initiatives out of the ground. Alex has a engineering and testing background in Research and Development at Alcatel-Lucent and Progress Software.

He loves talking about technology and sharing his knowledge through mentoring, writing articles and public speaking.
alex_van_boxel.title: Lead Data Architect

rakesh_kumar.name: Rakesh Kumar
rakesh_kumar.bio: Rakesh Kumar is a software engineer on the pricing team at Lyft. He started his career as an embedded software engineer for mobile devices; later he moved to server-side engineer to tackle bigger challenges in distributed systems. His interests include machine learning and streaming systems.
rakesh_kumar.title: Software Engineer

alexey_romanenko.name: Alexey Romanenko
alexey_romanenko.bio: Alexey Romanenko is Open Source Software Engineer in Talend, France with more than 17 years of experience in software development. During his career, he has been working on different projects, like high-load web services, web search engine and cloud storages. Also, a while ago, he developed and presented a course devoted to Hadoop/Cloud technologies for students. He is Apache Beam committer where he contributed to different IO components.
alexey_romanenko.title: Open Source Software Engineer in Talend
alexey_romanenko.company: Open Source Software Engineer in Talend

hai_lu.name: Hai Lu
hai_lu.bio: Hai is a staff software engineer from streaming infrastructure team (Apache Samza, Apache Kafka, Brooklin, etc.) at LinkedIn, with multi-years experience in the area of stream processing, data pipelines at scale. He is now focusing on Samza runner for Apache Beam API, stream processing in Python as well as stream processing applications in machine learning.
hai_lu.title: Staff Software Engineer

chengzhi_zhao.name: Chengzhi Zhao
chengzhi_zhao.bio: Chengzhi is the Sr. Data Platform Engineer of Meetup's Data Platform team which handles the company data infrastructure and tools to help machine learning and data scientist build data solutions. He has worked in the tech industry for 7 years across health care, retail, and social networking focusing on building scalable and reliable data Infrastructure.
chengzhi_zhao.title: Senior Data Platform Engineer

suneel_marthi.title: Member of Apache Software Foundation, Barcelona City Ambassador
suneel_marthi.company: Member of Apache Software Foundation, Barcelona City Ambassador
suneel_marthi.name: Suneel Marthi
suneel_marthi.bio: Suneel is a Member of Apache Software Foundation. He's previously presented at Flink Forward Berlin, Hadoop Summit Europe, Berlin Buzzwords, Big Data Tech Warsaw, and Beam Summit in the past. He's based out of Dulles, Virginia in the Washington DC Metro area.

kyle_weaver.name: Kyle Weaver
kyle_weaver.bio: Kyle is a Software Engineer at Google and an active contributor to Apache Beam. Prior to joining Google, he studied at Indiana University. He currently lives in the San Francisco Bay Area, and when he's not looking at a computer, you can usually find him playing cello or enjoying the sunshine.
kyle_weaver.title: Google

austin_bennett.name: Austin Bennett
austin_bennett.bio: Austin Bennett works for Sling Media (a DISH Company), mentors aspiring Data Scientists through Thinkful.com (a distributed/online bootcamp), as well as covering odds and ends for Bamboozoology, LLC. He is also a Cogntive Linguist and Researcher with an interest in Multimodal Communication; currently those pursuits are largely through RedHenLab.org. He is enthusiastic about the promise of Apache Beam, and Open Source Software generally.

pablo_estrada.name: Pablo Estrada
pablo_estrada.bio: Pablo is a Software Engineer from Mexico City. He lives in Seattle and works on Google's Cloud Dataflow product and is a committer for Apache Beam. He's worked all across the stack in Python and Java. His favorite activities are traveling, and getting drunk with the locals.
pablo_estrada.title: Apache Beam Committer.

ryo_okubo.name: Ryo Okubo
ryo_okubo.bio: I love software development, C++ and cats :)
ryo_okubo.title: Software Engineer

shuichi_suzuki.name: Shuichi Suzuki
shuichi_suzuki.bio: Having developed Stream Data Processing System using the Apache Beam with Spotify Scio on GCS, currently working with Mercari, inc as a Data Engineer.
shuichi_suzuki.title: Software Engineer
